nodes.bodyText: The test does not pass locally. Can we make something more reliable?
The test passes locally when i tested on my laptop. Not sure why it fails here. Do you have any suggestion as to how I should write a query so that it bloats up the TaskUpdate size and fails??
Reduce the allowed size to a very low number? What if this is reduced to 100B ?
Reducing the allowed size to 100B fixed it.

nodes.bodyText: one param per line; leave the first line empty
Not need to have such complicated example. Just use SELECT * FROM ORDERS LIMIT 10
not useful, just use getSession() in place.
